name: Solar PV System Costs by Country - Barbose & Darghouth (2016)
title: Solar PV System Costs by Country - Barbose & Darghouth (2016)
description: Installed price data for Japan, France, and Australia are based on the IEA Photovoltaic Power Systems Programme’s National Survey Reports (IEA-PVPS 2016) and for Germany are based on data compiled by the Center for Solar Energy and Hydrogen Research Baden-Württemberg (ZSW 2016)
